headline: Realty Income Expands Into Mexican Logistics With GIC Partnership
summary: Realty Income (NYSE:O) is entering the Mexican market with its first investment in the country. The company is partnering with Singapore's sovereign wealth fund GIC to invest over US$1.5b in build to suit logistics real estate. The partnership reflects a move into logistics and industrial assets outside the US, expanding beyond the company’s traditional retail focus. Realty Income, known for its monthly dividend model and large portfolio of net lease properties, has historically been...
